com.facebook.buck.util

Class ErrorLogger.DeconstructedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.ErrorLogger.DeconstructedException
  • Enclosing class:
    ErrorLogger

    public static class ErrorLogger.DeconstructedException
extends Object
    The result of exception "deconstruction". Provides access to the user-friendly message with context.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the message (and optionally stack trace) for the root cause.
